mapper.select: SELECT user_id, user_name, profile_img, sex, age, phone, sou_coin, user_type, email, create_time, last_edit_time, enable_status FROM tb_person_info WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_person_info( user_name, profile_img, sex, age, phone, sou_coin, user_type, email, create_time, last_edit_time, enable_status) VALUES (#{userName},#{profileImg},#{sex},#{age}, #{phone},#{souCoin},#{userType},#{email}, #{createTime},#{lastEditTime},#{enableStatus})
